message: did any one catch the puch line the .........Founder/CEO of My space has it bad....
This will happen to FB someday...you'll see. "Every dog has it's day."
@DaddyFlo Is that your long term prediction? ;)

Yes, it too will go the way of CompuServe, Prodigy, hell...Playboy. They were all dynasties at one time. People are fickle and easily become bored and/or distracted as they well should. There will always be a new or better whatever...could be your idea/company. PCs have only existed in my short term, but I was proly your age when simple handheld calculators were $300 (1973).
Heh, my first computer had 16 kilobyte memory. My first harddrive had 20 megabytes *g*
@HateBadDesign ...because that's all there were ever going to need. You know what I'm talkin about.  I thought you were some young whippersnapper.
@DaddyFlo I get that a lot. Must be my youthful personality!
@HateBadDesign Check this out. http://rachelbaker.me/facebook-big-boring/ I'm not the only one who things FB will someday wear out their welcome.
One day the Sun will burn out - that doesn't mean it'll happen tomorrow. If Zuckerberg is really smart, he'll start planning spaceships NOW ;)
